contest.eligibility: All replies are eligible for our drawing, if received on or before January 31, 1991.

questions: What is your regular brand of cigarettes?
About how long have you smoked this brand?
Are any of these words on your pack?
Which other brands would you consider buying?
Please tell us about yourself. Male/Female
In which of the following hobbies/interests do you frequently participate?
survey.return_instructions: Please relurn your completed survey by 1/31/91 in order to be eligible to win. Thank you.
